1.title: A New Beginning

choices: a normal shrinker story, for god´s sake

1111.content: Wait a sec, guys. There´s a meaningful choice ahead: a "normal" Tifa-GTs story or some "special/weird(stupid?)" story created by me (remember the one in my former interactive? How could you forget that...)?
1111.title: It´s me again

choices: Cont, with my story (note I write it)
11111.content:
A battle. For the world... for the Universe was beginning. Sephiroth the One Winged angel of Destruction...Could Strife the hero, the EX-SOLDIER... Tifa Lockheart my love... Sith, the Master... and me A regular Joe who was fortunate to have some great friends. You may be wondering why on earth I would be here with some Final Fantasy VII characters and Sith the one who cant ever find a break away from Giantess. Well it all began on that faithful day, back in the world we all know....

My name is Andrew Figueroa, an average guy who just wants to have a nice life. It was a regular day for the 18 year old teenager. I just came back from a long day of school. Sat on my trusty chair in front of my Computer and logged into writing.com. I began adding to one of Sith's many weird adventures. My writing isn’t to great at least I didn't think it was too good. Sith saw the many additions I made to his Giantess Weirdness Story and decided to send me a message. I opened it and read what it said.

"Hello, Redius, (note that’s my screen-name here if you didn't guess)I noticed the many additions you have made into my stories and just wanted to thank you. I can see you have talent and maybe we can become friends and write up some great stories. The potential is there and it is unlimited. Just...Just send me a message if you are interested. Also tell me which your favorite GTS character is. See you later hope to talk to you again soon."

Seemed like a harmless gesture of friendship. Little did I know it was the beginning of something bigger then i can possibly imagine. I replied of course cause of my nature to reply to anyone who bothers to talk to me. I told him about my self and that My favorite GTS character from his stories was TIfa Lockheart, cause for some reason she is just perfect... As soon as I pressed enter I received a reply almost instantly as if i was in a chat room. I opened it and read the very short message.

"Would you like to meet her in person?"

I was like WHAT!? is this guy smoking something or what I mean i read his stories which were great and all almost seemed like he actually been in a girl or two. But that cant be true. Then I think to myself "Maybe its just a friendly question from one writer to another." So I began typing a short response to it. "Yes." Like I said a short reply.

I received another message from him this time even a bit weirder then before. I began to read it
"Your wish is my...."
"Command."
Before I can finish reading the sentence I heard a guy behind me. I instantly turned around in time to see a man in a Cloak covering his body. All i could see from his face was a scar. The Man raises his hand to me. It begins to glow like what Kadaj's hand did in Advent Children. Before i can even react my body was covered in some sort of light. As soon as it came it disappeared. All i can remember was freefalling to a soft ground. Almost like a human skin. Last thing I heard before i was unconscious was a lovely voice. "What was that?"
11111.title: This is my story....

choices: Cont. (You can guess what happens next:)
111111.content:
Dark... It was all I remember when I was unconscious after that unexpected freefall. I began to regain conscious but "Instead of big dark blur I began seeing a big bright blur." (Similar quote form Return of a Jedi) Then I heard a voice. At first I couldn’t tell what it was saying all I knew it belonged to a woman, a beautiful one from such an angel like voice. Finally I began to hear clearly then...

"Finally, your awake you gave me quite the scare when you landed on me..."
My eyesight still hasn’t fully returned. but from what you can see your on a vast white field and its late in the afternoon due to ten light coming from the window.
"Sorry..."

I then hear the person began giggling slightly "Its ok I was just worried about you. You were out for about four hours now..."


Four hours? What kind of fall did I have? I began to stand up and rub my eyes together in hopes of returning my eyesight. Luckily it worked. My eyesight returned but i didn't expect what I saw next.

"WHA!"

I know I would find something weird when I awoke like maybe in some strange room or something but not...not a gigantic Tifa Lockheart's face towering over me. With the little scream I fell back on my sore bottom. I didn’t scream cause of the fact she was big...(ok so maybe it was a part of it.) But it was the fact that it was Tifa, a video game character who I kind of always liked to be in front of me at this very moment. TIfa a little sadden of my reaction just said...

"Don't be afraid I wont hurt you."

With my mouth still gaping open I realized what I was doing and quickly punch myself in the face. (OUCH!)At that moment I regain my composer (sort of I was still holding my face in pain)Tifa couldn’t help but look upon you with a confused stare.

"Why did you just punch yourself?"

Takes me awhile to answer her question cause i was in pain, still.

"Hit myself to stop acting like an idiot... was a good idea at the time but now..."

I instantly went back to rubbing my face hoping to relieve the pain. 'IDIOT!' was all i was thinking about in my head. 'Cant believe I just did that in front of Tifa. She probably thinks I am a weirdo or something.' Didn’t hit me then (not literally that she was pretty big compared to myself. All I heard was her again laughing lightly as if she saw my action funny... Tifa stopped quickly and apologized for her up brut behavior.

"Its okay I shouldn’t have been... well surprised and a bit to see you Tifa..."
'OH CRUD! Now she’s going to get suspicious on why I know her name! IDIOT!'

"How did you know my name?" She begins to stare down upon me with a angry look. "Who are you and how did you enter my room and..." She pauses for a moment. "and why are you so small?!"

I was in a lost how could I tell her that she isn’t suppose to exist that she is a video game character and 'GOOD JOB IDIOT! What are you suppose to tell her, even you don’t know how you got here, in Tifa's room and SMALL?!'

"T-T-Tifa, I don't know entirely for sure. L-L-Last thing I remembered was being in my room the next thing I know I was covered in light and awoke in your room. I-I don't even know how exactly I got here or even how I can ever go back..."

For some reason I began to cry. I can't exactly remember why I did... I was probably scared stiff of what Tifa may do to me due to my current size or... or the realization of the fact that you may not even be able to return home... Tifa notices me crying... sobering on my knees (because i was sitting down and my face buried in my knees). Tifa with her kind heart couldn’t help but feel sorry for me. She uses her right pointer finger to gently pat me on the head to try and reassure you.

"I-I'm sorry if I scared you... I didn’t mean too. If you don't want to you can tell me what you know later."
I began to stop crying, tears still dropping down the side of my checks but not 'crying' anymore. Tifa probably saw this cause her mood started to change. From your point of View you can see Tifa is smiling.

"Well, I am glad that you are starting to loosen up a bit. Hey I know your probably a little hungry aren’t you?"
I then remembered that I didn’t eat anything when I got back to school...

"Yeah I am a little hungry. What about you?" As if to answer her question you can hear a load roar from the bowels of Tifa stomach.
You answer your own question. "I’ll take that as a big yes."
Tifa blushes a bit feeling embarrassed that her stomach just did that. Both of you began to laugh at this. Looks like I will be able to live to tell about my stories with Tifa...
111111.title: The Awakening... (NOT THE BOOK)

choices: Cont.... Tifa relaizes I am Missing
1111111.content:
Tifa places her hand on the counter I was on, an invitation to be carried. I 'jumped' right into her hand. She moves her hand closer to her lovely, beautiful face. At first I expected a rough ride to her face. But to my surprise it was a gentle ride. I began to think to myself 'Has she done this before? Nah! She’s probably just very gentle.' Tifa just smiles.

"You know you never did tell me your name."
"Oh, sorry... My name is Andrew, Andrew Figueroa."
*giggles* "You know I don’t think I ever meet someone with the name Andrew before."
"Thanks..."
I couldn't help but blush at this. Tifa probably noticed this and just smiles. Tifa then began to walk downstairs. I noticed that it was Tifa old home in Nibelheim. I also and sadly noticed that I wasn’t even taller then Tifa's pointer finger. Heck I was even a thrid its size. She then sets me on the kitchen table. She places her face near me and smiles.

"I know just what to make in these kind of situations."
I couldn’t help but smile at her. While she was making some food I was busy well wondering how I got here. Suddenly, a loud sound interrupts me. Instinctively I jumped. I looked behind me to see what it was. It was just a plate of sandwiches... BIG sandwiches to me they were the size of a 18-wheeler cargo-box. Tifa just laughs lightly.

"Sorry..." Tifa says with a smile on her face. "I know you won't be able to finish it so when your done I'll more then happily eat the leftovers."

I couldn’t help but laugh at this. For some strange reason I did not even mind the fact that the sandwich could squash me to the point that i cant breath, it was just well illumining to be around Tifa, A giantess beauty who’s kindness probably surpasses her looks. I climed on to the nearest sandwich and took a bite out of it, well tired to really but i still manage to get some in my mouth. Tifa grabbed a chair and sat down to eat her own sandwiches. For some strange reason I wasn’t alarmed by the fact she was eating very near me. One false move I could have been sent to the inwards of Tifa. That never did managed to enter my mind.

After eating my huge piece, I mean very little piece I began thinking on how exactly I got here. I began to recall the time when I returned from school. Back was sore from caring to many things in my back-pack, 'There was nothing different that day. I just logged into writing.com to update some of Sith's stories, then...' At the very mention of the name Sith in my head I instantly remember being engulfed in light by a cloaked figure in my room. 'That guy must have sent me here... but who was he and why... I sense a Disturbance in the force... Wait, why the hell did I just said that.' At that very moment I noticed that i was standing on a sandwich and this sandwich piece just happens to be floating upwards... 'I have a bad feeling about this.' I must have walked on to it when I was busy thinking... 'Crap Tifa must think I am still on that other sandwich...' I turned around in time to see Tifa's sparkling white teeth coming down upon me.

'Crap no time to shout, I can jump into her mouth and avoid being bitten or jump backwards and hope she doesn’t bite twice... Crap not enough time... Dodge the Teeth and pass the gums to Tifa mouth here I come.' It was the last thing I was thinking about as I jumped for dear life into the surprisingly clean mouth. As I looked around I couldn’t help but be amazed at the sight, the pink squishy tongue underneath my feet and the smell of Tifa's inwards. (or was it the sandwich she was eating... cant remember). I then noticed i was at the back of her mouth in front of me the darkness of her throat. 'Ah shit.' She then swallows with me and the pieces of food into the abyss below. "Well look at the bright side Andrew, I am freefalling into Tifa's stomach where I am about to become one with her... AH FUCK! Who the hell do I think I'm kidding I don’t want to DIE!'

"AAAAAH!"

I continued to descend her esophagus until I hit the bottom of her stomach with a splash. I get into the fettle position and just await the end to my sorry ass life. My eyes closed as I await the painful burning sensation throughout my body. But all I felt was a little stinging feeling on my face... 'What the Fuck! Why I aren’t I dieing, I know I am in Stomach acid...' I then surface the liquid to catch a breath of air. Surprisingly there was enough air in her lovely stomach to support me. I dried my face with my hands... 'Weird what happen to the bumps of my face that I usually feel cause of my acne?' I cant rubbing my hands into my face trying to feel the little amount of zits on my face. I didn’t find any. 'I guess there’s a bright side after all.' I was so overwhelmed of my now clear face.

"YEAH! I AM ZIT FREE WOOT!"

All I can hear and see from the Movement of the stomach walls (that i could barely see) was Tifa rubbing her stomach and for some strange reason really enjoyed that specific piece of food. 'Great she probably think that thing that tasted good was the sauce in the sandwich and not little old me...' At that moment I decided to just lay on my back an floating in her stomach's juices.

"Hmm.. I wonder how long will it take for Tifa to notice I am missing." I said to no one in particular.

"That was good. So Andrew how did you like your sandwich?"

At that moment I raised my hand with only three fingers showing. I began to count down.

"3..."
"2..."
"1..."
1111111.title: A Predictable Lunch.

choices: Answer the door with me still in her.
Answer teh door with me out f her
11111111.content:
"Andrew?!" Tifa was now obviously worried.
Her heart beat racing up.
"Andrew, where are you!"
'If only I could talk to her. To let her know I' am safe.' It was no use I knew that she couldn’t hear me even if I yelled a teh top of my lungs cause she didn’t hear my zit free shout a few moments ago. I sighed feeling sorry for Tifa shes almost half dead from worrying.

"Use the Force, Redius"
"What the... who’s there?" I got up from my laying back position and walked on to a nearby dry patch of Tifa's stomach.
"Let go, Redius."

'OOOKAAY! Now I am hearing voices in my head.... I probably watched Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope one too many times...' I sat down, meditation style and just thought of one thing. 'This is just a dream there is no real thing as the Force, I am not in an alternate universe of Final Fantasy VII, and I am DEFEINTLY not inside Tifa's wonderful, unique stomach.' I looked around still able to hear Tifas rising heart beat the pulsing stomach walls. "Wow, it is really nice in here I guess this is what Sith and the others were talking about... it just feels, great.'

"Well, I guess I have nothing to lose by trying to use the 'Force'." Again to no one in particular. I closed my eyes, concentrated in trying to communicate with Tifa... Thinking back now I realized I had no idea what teh hell i was doing.

"Tifa..."
"Andrew? Is that you?"
"Tifa, can you hear me?"
"Andrew it is you, I was worried I may have eaten you. Where are you now?"
"Um... well, you well... I am in your stomach..."
"Oh my god I am so sorry, Are you ok?"
"Yeah I am fine... last place I expected to be but fine none of the less."
"Well that’s good, You know I thought I would notice a bit quicker with all the accidents with Sith and all that."
"Sith?! You know Sith?!"
"Yeah, he is my well..." It was plainly obvious what she was goanna say. Mostly because I read all of Sith's Tifa stories... (CURSE YOU, JERK!)
"Well he is my Boyfriend." She probably blushed at that.
The next thing I remember doing was breaking the Force link and got up and in a very deep voice yelled...
"NNNOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!"

"Andrew? What happen I cant hear you..."
I quickly got back in my meditation stance and reestablished the link.
"Sorry, bad connection..."
"So you know Sith?"
"Well a bit I meet him on a website and we kind of became pals writing up stories... but how did you tow meet?"
"Well... He came from another Dimension. In a very similar matter how you came here. He left a few days ago saying that he was going back to his world and told me to expect a new tiny friend. of his. I guess that makes you his tiny friend." I couldn’t tell from my position but I bet she smiled when she said that.

"I see..."

"So, Mr. Fig... I mean Andrew would you like to get out now or..." A telephone then rings. Its loud noise could be heard even in Tifa's little stomach. "One sec, let me get the phone."
I just nod my head... even though she defiantly can not see it. She picks up the phone and answers it.

"Lockhart residence... This is she... CID! What's wrong... Sith told you... Now... Ok, ok I'll get ready... Yeah, yeah...See you later." She then hangs up the phone.
"Tifa what was that about?"
She sighs "It was Cid, he said Sith told him to gather the gang back together and come to pick me up. I guess something important is about to happen. Oh my I am not even dressed appropriately. Sorry Andrew but I guess you need to stay in there a bit longer. Don’t want to have you take a look at me while I am undressing."

I just blushed. "T-T-Tifa I wouldn't dare do that with out your...your p-p-permission..." Tifa notices my difficulties to say my statement and just laughs lightly. Her stomach was shacking a bit when she did.

She went to her room I guess to change I couldn’t tell what was happening from inside but something told me she was in her room again. While she was getting dressed I could hear her humming a tune that I couldn’t identify but it was a soothing, lovely tune. She finishes getting dressed and begins to talk to me.

"Ok Andrew I am goanna lay down so you can climb out of my stomach, would be pretty odd to introduce you to the gang while you’re still inside of me."
We both laughed at this.
"Ok..."
She begins to lie down; I noticed the environment was shifting a bit. But before she could go all the way down to the floor a loud excessive knocking was heard from the door downstairs.
11111111.title: A turn of events...

Tifa mutters something under her breath and goes to get the door. The door opens and there stands quentesential villian Seproth.

Seproth: I have a letter for you

He hands Tifa a letter and leaves.

Love Seproth

P.P.S Nevermind I found it guess I didn't leave it there

P.P.P.S You know what I'm not gonna worry about you go to your meeting

Tifa: oh shit look at the time. I'll let you out later I gotta go

111111111.title: The letter

choices: A battle Braeaks out on TIfa's hand
1111111112.content:
Tifa runs outside her house.
“What took you so long?! I was waiting out here for forever!” A young women’s voice shouts out.
“Yuffie!”
“What were you expecting the Materia Clause?”
“Well, no but…”
“Come on Cid is getting very impatient. He is waiting with the rest of the gang on the…” Yuffie instantly grabs her mouth as if she was about the barf.
“Still have motion sickness?”
Yuffie just stares at Tifa with a serious face. Yuffie grabs Tifa’s hand and leads her outside of the city. As they ran they came upon the view of Cid’s new ship. Brilliant in design it looks similar to the old Higwind. Sadly, I didn’t know what was going on inside the bowels of Tifa. I didn’t mind at all though. I mean who wouldn’t when you were inside a lovely lady like Tifa. As soon as Tifa and Yuffie got on board the new Airship, it began to take off due to the loud engine noise rising up near by.

After a few odd minutes I didn’t hear a thing outside of Tifa’s body. I heard a few heart warming hellos. But that was about it. It was an eerie silence. From my position will the hellos were going on I guess Vincent, Red XIII, Caith, Cid, Yuffie, Barret and Cloud where present. It was Cid who broke the silence.

“Okay, I traveled across this planet finding the team for this meeting and SITH ISN”T EVEN FREAKING HERE WITH YOU!” Obviously Cid hasn’t lost his anger issues.
Tifa finally talked after a hesitant reply.
“Sith left a while back to his own dimension a few weeks ago, I haven’t heard from him since then. I was hoping if you guys knew.”
The whole gang sighed in annoyance in unison. Except Yuffie cause she was probably in the hold hanging on to her lunch.
“So why are we together then? Didn’t Sith say he will meet up with us when the gang is back together?” Cloud finally says
‘I think it is time I made an appearance.’ I said to myself. I establish a Force link with Tifa to inform her that now would be a good idea to present myself. Tifa agrees and talks to the group.
“Well, there is one thing I need to show you guys.” The whole gang looks upon her with a confused stare. Tifa then lied down to give me a easy way up her throat. I began to ascend her long esophagus. The constant down motion of the tunnel made it difficult to climb. But I made it to her mouth where I saw day light again. She gently placed me on her right cupped palm. The whole grouped yelled out in unison.
“SITH!”
“Not quite.” I replied.
“What the Fuck! Who are you?!” Barret asked
Tifa answered that question
“His name is Andrew. And I think this is one of Sith’s friend.”
It was understandable for there mistaken outburst. When they first meet Sith he was as tall as I was.
“Hell-o” I was about to say high when. ‘Something’s not right…’ I looked around the room from my position on Tifa’s hand but saw nothing until I spotted something Coming from the top right of my position. It was coming in fast I didn’t even know what it was and it was coming at me. As it came closer I saw the thing no a person who was my size take out a small rod of some sort. I then realized a little too late it was a weapon. And not just any weapon. The rod was activated showing a blue blade extending from it. ‘A lightsaber Coo... OH SHIT!’ I instinctively placed both my hands up to try and block the attack. As soon as it came within striking distance it hit hard, Hard enough for Tifa’s cupped hands to become a stretched out hand. But instead of me being dead the attack was dead in its tracks. In my hands was a golden hilt Lightsaber with a Viridian color blade. My outfit changed as well. I was now wearing a burgundy (dark red) gi similar to what Crono from Chrono Trigger and un top of Gi there was a similar colored cloak. The attacker was still in the air with his saber diagonally perpendicular to my blade. I looked upon the attacker. He was wearing a Dark Brown Cloak with a darken face with a scar. ‘A SCAR!’

“It’s been a while, Redius.”
1111111112.title: The True Awaking

11111111121.content:
“It’s been a while, Redius.” The Cloaked figure says
“SITH!” I shout with a surprised expression on my face.
“You catch on quick…” He says still in the air with his saber still locked with mine. “Defend yourself!”
Before I knew it Sith began to attack me. With each strike the attacks became more furious then the last. Luckily I managed to Block all his attacks. Downward slash, overhead block, diagonal slash, reverse parry. I finally found an opening I parried his diagonal attack and countered with a 360 horizontal strike. Sadly it didn’t connect; Sith Just dodged it with a Cool Jedi style back-flip. It was obviously a one sided fight. We stared at each other from opposite sides of Tifa’s left hand.

A show down for the ages, a master and a apprentice. I remember getting Goosebumps during the fight. ‘I can’t believe I am wielding a Lightsaber, a REAL ONE!’ Remembering now of that fight I shouldn’t have been concentrating more on the fact my life was on the line… The stare down lasted for what felt like an eternity… I made a newbie mistake. I attacked first…

I ran towards Master at full speed. He came at me as well. At full combat now, both of us attacking each other with every thing that our little bodies can produce, Slash block, Slash Parry Counter… I recalled the fight with Obi-Wan and Anakin on Mustafar; tension was high between those two. This fight felt the same. Suddenly we are at a saber lock ounce again.

“Good, Good give into you anger, only your hate can destroy me. Then your Journey down Sith will be complete.”
“No, I’ll never join you!” still in the saber lock I tried to come up with a new tactic one that I can use to turn the tie of the battle. I then felt something, a strong tug around my belt on my right side. ‘That’s it.!’ I called upon the force to reach the item attached to my belt. It was another saber hilt, same color and design as the one in my right hand. With my left hand I let go of my saber that was locked with Sith’s and grabbed the other saber. I ignited it quickly attacking at Sith directly. Sith saw this coming and just smiled. He jumped backwards but this time was ‘floating’ in mid air. (Dual of the Fates song begins) I jumped after him with both Golden hilt Lightsabers ignited with the legendary Viridian glow. I attached both my sabers together forming a New one. A pole-arm stile Saber and with it I spin it over my head 3 times before attacking Sith. Attacking with a horizontal attack from the left to begin and Quickly afterwards another attack from the top right towards the cloaked figure. Sadly Sith blocked both of them as if they were nothing.
With that Sith attacked again knocking me down back to Tifa’s hand. I got back to my feet just in time to see Sith landing a few ‘feet’ ahead of myself. With a mocking voice he said.
“You’re holding the saber too tightly.”
*angry growl* With that I attacked Sith again but subconsciously I loosen my grip around my saber. I attacked with all my might but inexpertly Sith blocked the attack knocking me back onto my back and sending my saber flying off the ‘platform’ deactivating. I started to get beck up but stopped half way because of a blue blade dangerously close to my neck.
“Now to loosely…” (Duel of the Fates song ends)
Tifa was about to grab the cloaked figure fearing for my life. But she stopped herself when she noticed the cloaked figure deactivated his saber and put it back on his belt. He then stretches his right arm out towards me.
“Impressive…” I accepted the invitation of help and grabbed on to his arm pulling myself up and standing right next to him.
“…Most impressive, You have learned much my apprentice.”
“Say what!” Sith just smiles and removes his hood.
Tifa then looks upon the small one inch attacker and realizes who he was (cause she didn’t hear me yell out Sith before.)
“Sith, Is that you?!”
Sith then turns towards Tifa with an even bigger smile on his face.
“Hey Honey, missed me?”
11111111121.title: Duel of the Fates.

111111111211.content:
Sith then turns towards Tifa with an even bigger smile on his face.
“Hey Honey, missed me?”
“Sith, where have you been and why did you just attack Andrew?”
Sith just continues to smile.
“Sorry to worry you Tifa. Like I said before I left I was returning to my world to check up on a few things and…”
I was starting to lose my nerve… I mean in a Very, VERY Bad way. “HOLD IT! Why the heck am I here?! AND! Why the heck am I decked out like this, since when did I own a saber and, WHY THE FUCK DID YOU ATTACK ME I COULD HAVE DIED?!” Tifa and Sith just stare at me with an awkward stare…
“Sorry, It’s just… It’s just been all too weird for me. I mean I was just in my room the next thing I know I am well here…” I said with a more even tone. Sith just puts his hand on my shoulders.
“It’s ok man; I can understand how you feel. It must be tough for you to sink it all in. Oh By the way why don’t you look over there.”
“Huh?” He points towards the edge of Tifa’s hand.
“Just look down over that edge.”
I did what he told me to do but as I neared the edge of the hand I got on to my fours and crawled to the edge, As I peered over the side down to the ground, the site of the high elevation made me instantly dizzy. As I continued to look down I notice a shiny object approaching from a great distance. ‘What’s that?’ The object I could tell was spinning. Faster and faster it spun. I realized too late what it was. ‘OH SHIT!’ I fell back on to my bottom barely dodging the item. The object was my Double-Bladed Saber Hilt. It went straight to Sith’s hand. Sith just began to laugh….
“Sith…” Tifa said with an annoyed tone.
Sith quickly stopped laughing and apologized. I stood up with a furious face staring at Sith. He came up to me and gave me back my saber. I detached the two sabers and placed them back on my belt. But before I could say anything the ship rocked violently. All I heard was a violent series of curse and profanity. It was obviously Cid.

“FUCK, FUCK, FUCK, FUCK, FUCK! I take my hands off the wheel for one MESALY SECOND and NOW I AM LOSELY CONTROL! HIT THE DECK PEOPLE THIS THING IS GONNA HIT THE GROUND HARD!”

The whole room was shacking violently and through the cockpit window the ground was approaching us very quickly. With all his might Cid couldn’t regain control of the ship. As the ship made impact of the solid ground the force knocked everyone off their feet. Tifa fell forward with her mouth open wide about to scream but she didn’t. And the reason she didn’t was that me and Sith fell into Tifa’s mouth accidentally being swallowed. It all went dark. All I remember was furiously cursing at Sith as we fell down to Tifa’s belly.
111111111211.title: An accident.

1111111112111.content:
It was a smoother trip down then the last time I was here. Probably due to the fact she was falling onto the ground after the Airship crash. We past the entrance of her stomach, The Lake of acid below us. I heard Sith yell out “CANNONBALL!” At that moment I saw Sith put his knees closer to his body forming a ball. ‘Well if that doesn’t prove that he’s been in a giantess or two then I don’t know what does.’ With a splash we landed in the lake of stomach juices. Again in the sticky moist environment at least this time I know I am not goanna die… I swam to the surface of the lake to get a breath of air. As I reached the top all I could hear was a yell of joy from Sith.

“YEAH! WOOT! That was fun.” He yelled breathing heavily.
“You are one crazy son of a gun.” I replied to his outburst.
“Hey it could have been worse.”
“How?” I asked him with an aggravated face.
“Well we could have landed underneath Tifa giantess body.”
I hesitate to reply. “You got a point. I guess we ended up being lucky.”
“In my experience there is no such thing as Luck, only the force.”
“Whatever Obi-Wan...” I say staring at the amused Sith. “So what happen?”
“To put it bluntly, Cid got distracted by our fight lost control of the ship and crashed somewhere in the Mountains.”
“Ok, but what about Tifa when she finds out what happen to us…”
“Don’t worry I informed her where we were and that we will be ok.”
“When did you do this?”
“When you were busy cursing and screaming at me on our way down, that’s when I informed her through the force.”
“Oh, so we goanna get out of here now?” I said following Sith to a dry patch of stomach to sit on.
“No, this is a perfect time to discuss a few maters in secret and allow the gang to get the ship up and running.”
“Ok, but don’t you think they will need help doing that?”
“At our size we would only be a burden.”
“Size matters, not.” I say to Sith with a smile on my own face.
“Shut up green midget and come and join in a meditation link. I would like to test you mental strength.”
“Ok, but that won’t answer the questions in my head…”
“A strong Body and a Strong mind is the key to any victory, but if any one lack then your victory is, well lost.” He said as I look at him for a moment wondering what to do. I ended up joining him in the meditation.

We joined minds; at first I saw only the blackness of my shut eyelids. But after some fierce concentration I saw a white field of nothing. On the other side of this plain I saw Sith. The corners of my vision were a bit blurry as in a dream like state.

“Where are we?”
“We are in the battlefield for the minds. Here I want to test your fighting skills without harming Tifa and also test the reaction time of your very mind itself.”
“And how do we do that?” I asked knowing the answer already.
“Simple, Defend yourself.” He rushed at my with his saber drawn and it ignited.

‘Just great…’ I said to myself grabbing my Lightsaber attached to the left side of my belt. I ignited it allowing the viridian glow around me and the surroundings. I placed the saber near my right ear at a 90 degree angle pointing the blade directly towards the charging Sith.

Outside of Tifa’s inwards the gang recovered from their unwanted crash. They managed to get the ship evened out so they wouldn’t have to work in a slanted position. Cid and Barret were asserting the damage on the rest of the ship. Tifa and Yuffie were alone in the conference room talking over Tifa’s Two unexpected (is it really unexpected?) passengers.

“Are they really alright in there? I mean must be uncomfortable in there, no offense.”
Tifa smiles warmly. “None taken, Sith told me they are alright earlier. Sith wanted to talk to them in private about something.”
“Oh, um so how does it feel with them in you?”
“Well…” She blushes at this and places her right hand on her exposed stomach. “I do feel them. Every step they take, every movement I can feel. It feels weird to know someone alive is in you and well enjoying themselves.”
Yuffie giggles at this. “That’s cool, well you know for some reason I have this strange feeling I meet Andrew before…”
“You know I have that feeling as well…”
Before Tifa could finish her sentence a loud series of curses and yelling is heard from outside the room.

“FUCK SHIT BICTH MOTHER FUCKING! I can’t believe the amount of damage there is on this piece of shit!” Cid and Barret enter the room.
“HEY DON’T TALK ABOUT MY SHIP LIKE THAT TENT THEIF!”
“Stop calling me TENT THEIF! That happened two years ago LET IT GO!”
“Not unless you take back what you said about my ship, TENT THEIF!”
“NEVER!”
Cid then notices that half the group is missing.
“Hey, WHERE THE FUCK IS EVERYONE ELSE, I AM NOT GONNA FIX MY SHIP ALONE?!” As to answer his question Cloud enters right behind him.
“Man your loud, Vincent, Caith and Red XIII went off a while back. They said something about something important they had to take care of in a near by village.”
“Those ungrateful A-holes, not even staying long enough to help out. And where the fuck is that little midget I need to ask him a few questions.” Cid yells out in disgust. Tifa just points at her stomach blushing in embarrassment. Barret just shakes his head.
“Dam Tifa can’t you at least eat some real food instead of eating your boyfriend and his friends…” Tifa blushes tomato red.
“For once I agree with Tent Thief here.”
“HEY I THOUGHT I TOLD YOU NOT TO CALL ME THAT!”
“AND I TOLD YOU I’LL STOP CALLING YOU THAT IF YOU TAKE BACK WHAT YOU SADI ABOUT MY SHIP!” Cid and Barret just stare at each other with anger in their eyes.

1111211.content: It has become an every-day procedure: since I usually wake up quite early, I climb Tifa´s bedside table and wait there for her to wake up. It´s quite comforting to watch Tifa in her sleep, to see her sheer beauty and innocence. It also provides me with the opportunity to think about lots of things. My relationship with Tifa, my life, my current situation...all kind of things. It sometimes makes me feel down, but these thoughts fade away when Tifa awakes and cheers me up. It´s not in her nature.
1111211.title: Thoughts about my life

choices: proceed to the morning rituals (i.e. brushing teeth)
11112112.content:
Looking at Tifa´s chest moving up and down as she was breathing peacefully in her sleep, I decided to hop onto her bed and climb onto her body. That´s some kind of every day procedure as well, since it sometimes causes her to wake up, and being near her makes her feel good - at least that´s what she´s telling me all the time - and it makes me feel better anyway. So I jumped from the bedside table, falling down quickly and landing on Tifa´s soft bed, only inches away from her sleeping, gigantic body. I was standing directly in front of the fingers of her left hand, and I couldn´t help but staring at them. Tifa´s fingers are just perfect, like she is in every other aspect. Her fingers are quite long - of course not too long - and her fingertips are so soft...you would understand if you were less than inch tall and being carefully touched by her fingertips so often. I somehow also like her fingernails. I don´t know why, but I hate it when women are wearing colored nail polish. It just looks so out of place to me. Tifa on the other hand has natural fingernails. They´re not too short, they´re in fact relatively long, yet not overly long. They´re also very well manicured. No matter how few make up Tifa uses, she takes great care in her personal hygiene, also in manicure. Although she doesn´t paint her fingernails with colored nail polish, she sometimes uses transparent nail polish, which hasn´t any great effect on her nails, it just makes them shine. It´s in any case better than colored polish, and somehow even cute. Speaking of her look, I guess I´ve said it many times: I´ve never seen a girl as gorgeous as Tifa. Her body is perfect, simply flawless, and by the way: she´s so slender, but fortunately not as thin as some models. Surprisingly enough, I wouldn´t even describe Tifa as "sexy". That term would desecrate her beauty. "Sexy" is for women who want to be wooed by a man and invest hours and hours in putting make up on their faces, and all that make up makes them look undesirable. Tifa on the other hand is cute and and a natural beauty, and she looks innocent. I think that´s because of her face. The word to describe her face would be "angelic". no matter whether you´re looking at her soft cheeks or her lips, everything reminds you of angel´s face. There´s a warmth that emanates from it, and I think it has an effect on people - like me. Whenever I look into Tifa´s eyes and see her smiling with a warm expression, it gives me a comfortable feeling. That must be some sort of gift, cheering people up with a smile. Of course, One has to mention her long black hair. It´s just too cute! And it´s really beautiful. I guess Tifa really has to invest a lot of time and effort in order to keep them in shape, especially since they´re so long. Some would certainly mention her breast...ahem. I´ll just say: they´re nice, really, although not as big as some claim, and it´s not the best thing about her overall look. Enough of Tifa´s beauty. What makes her such a wonderful person is not the way she looks. It´s her inner beauty. Tifa is simply the kindest person I´ve ever encountered. She´s always nice to everyone, and she never ever is behaving rude. She´s also a caring and loyal friend. I think I am the living example. She would never let down a friend in need of help. When I shrank down to this size, Tifa immediately told me that she would take care of me. Despite herself being a great fighter, she´s a gentle person, and in fact she hates fighting, she´s just doing it for self-protection and protecting those close to her - like myself ;). One has to say that she also is quite a funny person sometimes. Since she´s almost always in a good mood, we´re having fun together quite often. For example, we´re sometimes just fooling around like children, or we´re telling jokes to each other. But she´s also teasing me sometimes in a nice way, in any case never in a humiliating way. It´s just funny. I also have to admit that Tifa really is an intelligent woman, quick witted and having a good knowledge in many fields. You can really talk with her about some complicated or sophisticated themes. I simply love her for what she is - the most adorable person I have ever met in my life. In my opinion, she has the radiance of an angel, and from the moment I met her, all those years ago, not a day has gone by when I haven´t though about her. And whenever I´m with her...I can´t explain this feeling. She is in my very soul, as well as I am in hers. Yes...I think...I think we love each other.
Ahem. All this admiration for Tifa I´m telling you now are based on the thoughts I was having back then when I sat next to Tifa´s body. I was still having them when I finally climbed onto her belly and sat down there. Deep in my thoughts, I didn´t realize first that Tifa actually was awake staring down at me and smiling at my obvious daydreaming. She grabbed me carefully between her thumb and pointer finger, bringing me closer to her face, and guess what? I still didn´t realize! She was smiling as she was amused about this, and she cleared her throat in an exaggerated manner.
"Ahem!"
"Huh? T-Tifa! You´re awake?!"
"Obviously."
"Good morning, then!"
"Good morning. What was that all about? Were you daydreaming?"
"Yes...I think so. Sorry."
"Let me guess: about me?"
"Huh? I...I..."
"Come on, Sith, don´t be shy! I´m your friend! You can tell me."
"Well...yes."
"Hm...I´m honored to be the subject of your daydreams."
"Very funny..."
"Hey, I´m not teasing you! I´m really honored! What exactly were you dreaming of - or thinking of?"
"I just realized once again how damn luck I am to have you as my girlfriend, Tifa."
"Sith...thank you! you´re so kind! And I actually feel the same way. And besides, I´m probably the only girl whose boyfriend actually is small enough to travel through her body. I think that´s cool! And somehow romantic..."
"If you say so..."
Well, that was a typical morning-conversation between us. You may call it cheesy, but I think love is always cheesy somehow. But I don´t care. Being with Tifa is all that matters.

Our story starts when Lady Yuna was about 16 years old. She decided to go on a journey with a ship, in order to see all of Spira´s aspects, the world she was supposed to save someday. The ship Yuna was on went into a terrible storm, and although the ship went through this disaster without any major damage, Yuna was not so lucky: she was washed overboard, and no matter how hard she tried to swim back to the ship, she soon got lost in the ocean.
The last thing she knew was that she managed to swim to a beach, were she soon fell unconscious. But before that, she saw tiny people before, only half as big as one of her fingernails. They were visibly shocked by the appearance of the giantess that now fell unconscious.

1132111111121211111111112112212111211122.content:
Sith, Drez, Shadow, and Drolos stood by the edge of the beach, watching Ayane carry the injured Sephroth into the distance. A beautiful sunset was occuring in the afternoon sky, and a sense of calm after the storm had settled.

"Okay, what the hell just happened!"

Everyone looked at Drez, who had spoken up.

Drez, seeing he had everyone's attention, continued. "Well, I mean, did anyone keep track of everything that just happened?"

Sith looked out into the distance, admiring the way the giant Ayane looked when she ran into the distance. A snapping set of fingers brought him back to the current situation.

"Oh, right". Sith looked like he was thinking hard for a second, and then smiled like he had some big explanation. Everyone waited.

"No idea!"

"Hmm," Shadow said after an akward silence. "I think I might be able to toss a few pieces of information together for all of us. But I'll need your guyses help."

Everyone nodded, and he continued. "Okay then, Sephroth was sending his evil giantesses to attack the island, so he could rule it as his own kingdom. Or run a GTS themed amusement park, I guess both would sound good to him. Anyways, I came to help you defeat the second giantess who came here, who turned out to be Ayane."

Sith put in his two cents. "Yeah, but you killed her, I'm pretty sure I saw her burn up, or something. But then she just reappeared. Must be some new technique taught to her by Sephroth."

"And then," Drez continued, "We all contemplated putting all our differences beside with her and going for a trip into her womb..." Drez saw all the faces of people staring at him strangely, and quickly said" just kidding, eheheh... damn..."

Then Drolos contributed to the whole. "Yeah, and then I joined the fight all overly-powerful like, and completely won the battle. But then Shadow got taken over by the millenium ring of all things, and we got in a whole other fight."

"Then", Drez finished off, "We all made up with her-"

"So Sephroth joined back into the frey, and he totally decimatedus, but a final attack managed to get him and he was carried away. Oh, and Shadow beat the evil spirit, and broke the millenium item." Sith crossed his arms.

"Yeah," Shadow muttered, a teardrop appearing on his head. "I know those things are expensive, maybe I shouldn't have just done away with it like that..."

"And where was I?" a voice queried above everyone. They looked up to see Yuna with an arched eyebrow.

"Ah, right", Sith thought, "I think I saw you mentioned once or twice..."

A loud commotion erupted in the back of the gathering crowd. Suddenly, soldiers on dragons flew to the clearing and landed in front of Sith and Drez.

"Lord Drez, Lord Sith, we are here to recieve our orders from Lord Sephroth." The general got on a knee. "Do you happen to know where we may find him?"

"..."

"..."

"..."

"...wtf?"

"Right..." Sith thought for a moment longer, then came to a desicion. He looked at everyone in the crowd, and spoke aloud.

"As the king's go-to guy, I hereby make this unnoficial rule under his name!" Sith looked out from Drez, to Yuna, the crowd of people, and finally Drolos and Shadow. "From now on, please take some consideration for the rest of us, and review what you right before pressing the send button. This isn't an AOL chat room! Okay?"

Everyone bowed their heads, and muttered "We're sorry."

Yuna looked around, wondering what to do. Everyone looked so sad now, and she felt like she had to make up for it somehow. A thought occure to her, and she gave an exsasperated sigh.

"Okay, who wants to celebrate the victory with a Vore Party...?"

The crowd erupted in cheers, and everyone ran off to the city to get their scuba gear and get drunk.

113211112.content:
Yuna was visibly puzzled with these revelations.
"Voretopia?"
"Yes. It´s no surprise that you never heard of us. No one Spira even knows that we and this country even exist. But from time to time, inhabitants of Spira strand on our beaches - surprisingly only women - and are causing trouble. That´s why we had to put you into this unpleasant situation. I hope you understand."
"Yes...I understand. But I´m not evil, I don´t want to hurt anyone!"
"That´s what all the giantesses from Spira say. By the way, what´s your name?"
"I am Yuna, daughter of summoner Braska."
"B-Braska?!"
Lord Sith and Lord Drez looked at each other with relief. This revelation was a good sign.
"You´re the daughter of Lord Braska...you must know that Lord Braska´s wife, your mother, also stranded here.
"Really?!"
"Yes. Fortunately, she was a kind giantess and instead of hurting us, she helped us in some difficult situations. So we helped her to get away from this island by building a boat for her. Well, iz was a gigantic ship for us, but for her it was just a boat. It took a few months, but we made it."
"So my mother was not an evil giantess..."
"Yes. And I think you´re gentle, too."
"Really?"
"Yes. You don´t look evil, and since you´re the daughter of the giantess I spoke of, I think we can trust you."
"Thank you, Lord Sith."
"So...do you promise that you will not hurt any inhabitant of our island?"
"I promise; in the name of my mother."
"Good, Lady Yuna. We will release you and help you build a boat. But it will take some months for us."
113211112.title: Unexpected revelation

choices: the king wants to meet Yuna in person

1132111121.content:
The soldiers and some ordinary people who have been gathering around the tied up giantess were still surprised by the fact that Yuna was indeed Lord Braska´s daughter. It seemed that they wouldn´t have to worry about her that much, a somehow new situation. Voretopia´s people were used to being attacked by evil giantesses, and even children were being trained in the arts of giantess-hunting. So a gentle giantess was kinda refreshing.
Lord Sith stepped onto a platform, giving his soldiers advice.
"Soldiers, release her!"
The men immediately began to work on cutting Yuna´s shackles (hope that´s the right noun), but it took some time. The shackles had been thick and strong in order to prevent the giantess from getting up. Buf after some minutes, the work was done and Yuna was finally able to stand up.
"Ah...at last."
She limbered up her muscles a bit, then looked down to her feet. All those tiny persons were quite an unusual sight for Yuna, in fact they were only 1/10 of an inch tall (about 2.5 millimetres) compared to her, so she could hardly even see them. The people around here were amazed about Yuna´s size as well, although it shouldn´t have been that extraordinary, yet they weren´t used to seeing such beautiful giantesses.
Yuna now looked at Lord Drez and Lord Sith, and she went on her knees in order to get a better look at those two tiny Lords. As her face was now nearer to them, the two were almost overwhelmed by its sheer beauty. Her face was immaculate; it was perfect, and due to her gigantic size it wasn´t that hard to notice. In fact, her face alone was so big that an ordinary person from Voretopia would have been able to enter her lachrymal gland (or tear duct; I dunno) without any problem. She looked at the two and smiled gently.
"Thanks for trusting me."
"Don´t mention it, m´lady."
She moved her right hand down in front of them, inviting them to jump on. And so they did. The boldly hopped onto her huge hand that she now brought nearer to her face. Her skin was really soft, one could easily sleep on it quite good. Her fingernails were normal in terms of lenght, not too long and not too short. They were manicured good as well, and she was wearing only decent nail polish, not colored, but only shiny transparent polish. When she held the two in front of her face, she giggled.
"You really are tiny, but...you´re soooo cute as well!"
"You heard that, Drez? She´s talking about us as if we were just some cuddly toys. Darn it, we´re warriors, for god´s sake."
"I think she didn´t mean that, compadre. I guess she likes us. Well, for my part, I´m not surprised. I´m a ladykiller, after all, but you..."
"Shut your piehole! I´m popular with women as well, I have a cute girlfriend and..."
Yuna giggled again about this (terribly written) dialogue, just when a soldier arrived from the capital.
"Lord Sith! Lord Drez! I bring news from his majesty!"
"What news?"

11321111212.content:
"Bad news, sir. We have sighted a giantess at the east coast of the continent."
"Gentle or evil giantess?"
"We don´t know, sir. By now, she´s only been walking around near the coast."
Bad news indeed. An evil giantess would mean a hard fight. But this time, they had a powerful ally.
"Uhm...Lord Sith? Lord Drez?"
"Yes, Lady Yuna?"
"...I´m going to help you. If that giantess reall is evil, then I´ll fight her. I´ll protect you and your people."
"M´lady...I don´t know what to say."
Yuna smiled with determination. This was her chance to prove that she was not evil. And she really liked this country and their inhabitants, so helping them was the least thing she could do.
"Lord Drez, what do you say?"
"It sounds like a good idea to me. She will be very useful to us in case the giantess is evil."
"Okay, then. You´ll carry us?"
"Sure."
So Yuna began to move to the east coast, with the two tiny lords on her right hand. She was full of self confidence, for the first time in her life she would really be able to help others. As if it was an exercise for her great task: one day, she would become a summoner, like her father, and would travel through Spira in order to destroy Sin. But that was the future in that moment (or wasn´t it? Sometimes the future can change...). Right now, she had to concentrate on a possible fight.
11321111212.title: Yuna´s determination

choices: the 2 Lords and the 2 giantesses arrive at Vore City
113211112122.content:
(Remember: the story takes place before the story FFX, so Yuna and Rikku haven´t met each other before).
Yuna and the two lords quickly arrived at the east coast of voretopia, and they could see the giantess at a great distance. Well, a great distance for voretopians, not for an ordinary inhabitant of Spira like Yuna. The giantess realized that someone was coming and turned around to Yuna. She had long blond hair that she´s been wearing up. She was wearing an orange shirt as well; and there were some accessoirs in her outfit, for example she had her fingernails painted yellow. Strangely enough, she had bright green swirls in her eyes, and that made her eyes look even more beautiful.
It seemed that she was surprised to see Yuna; she came nearer to Yuna and looked into her eyes curiously.
"Hello there. Can you help me? I was washed onto the coast of this island, and I haven´t seen any other person around here."
"Who are you?" Yuna asked, a bit relieved as the giantess appeared to be gentle.
"Me? I´m Rikku, the daughter of Cid."
"Did you say...Cid? Cid from the Al-Bhed?"
"Uhm...yeah, that´s right. I´m an Al-Bhed, but please don´t..."
"Cid is my uncle!"
"What?!"
"He was my mother´s brother!"
"Wait a sec...then...then you must be Yuna, right?"
"Yes. I´m Yuna of Besaid."
"That´s great! You´re my cousin then! My father told me so much about you, Lord Braska and his wife."
"*giggle*"
Lord Drez and Sith didn´t know what to think of these events. Sure, it seemed that the giantess was gentle, but they didn´t understand their girlie talk.
"Anyway, can you tell me where I am?"
"Well..."
"Hey, what´s that on your right hand?"
Rikku took a close look on Drez and Sith, bringing her gigantic head close the hand they were on. She stared at them, curious like a child.
"Are these your miniature toys?"
"Actually, they´re living persons."
"What? They´re alive! Hm...now I see it. Wow, they really are tiny...but soooo cute as well!"
Rikku giggled, and Sith was pissed a bit while Drez enjoyed the women talking about him like that.
"Oh boy, not that "cute" talk again..."
"Relax, Sith."
"Well, you two. My name is Rikku. And who´re you?"
"I´m Lord Drez, m´lady."
"Lord Sith, m´lady."
Both of the girls began to giggle again, when Sith interrupted them.
"Ahem. Didn´t you want to know where you are now?"
"Oh, right, I almost forgot."
"I propose we go to our capital. The king will tell you everything."
Yuna and Rikku prepared to leave, when Rikku asked Yuna something.
"Uhm...Yunie?"
"Yes?"
"May I hold one of the two while we´re walking? They´re so cute, and I´d like to."
"WHAT?! What does she think we are? Toys?!"
"Relax, Sith. Enjoy the ride."
"All-right, all-right. Tsk."
"Is that okay for you two?"
"Sure. It´s okay for my pal here as well, I think."
So Rikku carefully grabbed Sith and placed him on her right hand. She looked down at him and smiled.
"Enjoy the ride!"
113211112122.title: Yuna and Rikku

1132111121221.content:
Vore City was located somewhere in the middle of the country, and it was really worth of being a capital. Its appearance resembled ancient cities (i.e. Rome or Athens; there were also resemblences to a certain city called Theed), and yet the city was not without any signs of technical progress, as Vore City possessed some powerful and modern weapns, as well as some modern vehicles. The king´s palace was located directly in the center of the city, resembling chateau Versailles and other 17th century buildings. It must have been an amazing sight for Yuna and Rikku: they have never seen something like that before, the sheer beauty of Voretopia´s architecture was overwhelming and unlike anything that could be seen somewhere else in Spira. Although it was a big city, there was no way Rikku or Yuna could have moved further into the capital; though the streets were wide, they weren´t even half as wide as one of the giantesses´ feet. So they had to stay outside the capital.
Some people came out of their houses and looked at the two gorgeous giantesses with great interest. It was unusual to see a gentle giantess here in Vore City, and the people actually enjoyed it.
"Wow. This city really is beautiful."
"Thank you, Lady Yuna. Your respect for our cultutre and architecture is most pleasant."
"Yeah, Yunie is right. This city is a-m-a-z-i-n-g!" Rikku yelled.
After some time, they saw some soldiers leaving the capital, followed by their king, Voreman VIII.
"Ah, Drez, Sith. Welcome back. I see you brought the giantesses with you. Or they brought you with them. Anyway, they seem to be gentle. That´s quite a relief. Might I know your names?"
"I am Yuna, your majesty."
"And I´m Rikku. Pleased to meet you!"
"And I am King Voreman VIII., ruler of this country. Pleased to meet you. I guess I should be telling you something about our country and its history, ladies."
"That would be nice of you, Sir."

113211112122112.content:
The king´s mood was worsening due to the events.
"Shadow, Drolos, leave us."
"But Sir..."
"Do you want to defy my orders? There is no place for your personal antipathy against giantesses."
"Of course, Sir."
Both returned to the Sith, looking at the giantesses with anger.
"I´m sorry, Lady Yuna and Rikku. Their hatred for giantesses is sometimes disturbing. Anyway, I think you should know something about our country. Lady Yuna, Lord Sith already told you something?"
"Yes, my lord, a bit."
"Good. You probably never heard of Voretopia before. In fact, no one from Spira has. Our existence is completely unknown to the rest of the world. But despite our nearly microscopic size, our country has become quite wealthy. Unfortunately, our lives are sometimes disturbed by giantesses who strand on our coasts. Mostly they´re evil, and in some cases we even have to kill them. But you seem to be gentle."
"Thank you, your highness. I assure you that we don´t have evil intentions."
"I´m sure you don´t. Besides, I´ve already been told that your Lord Braska´s daughter, and that´s saying a lot."
Voreman, with Lord Sith and Drez next to him after having left Yuna´s and Rikku´s hands, took a closer look at the two (which caused his neck to hurt as he had to stare high in the sky in order to see the giantesses´ faces), and made a decision.
"You must know, ladies, that today is our national holiday, the anniversary of our heroic first fight against a giantess. I would like you to be our special guests at the festivities, as a sign that not all "normal" female people of Spira are evil."
"Yeah! A party! That sounds like fun, right, Yunie?"
"We would be honored to join in, Sir."
Both Yuna and Rikku bowed down to the king and then sat down on the ground.

114221.content:
Our story starts shortly after the destruction of Sin (before Yuna and Rikku even met Paine). Yuna might have saved the entire world from the infamous Sin, but she was still sad about the loss of Tidus. But one day, her cousin Rikku brought her a sphere with images of her beloved friend. So she decided to become a sphere hunter in order to search for hints on Tidus´ whereabouts. Of course Rikku and some of her Al-Bhed comrades joined Yuna in her desperate search.
One day, they heard rumors about a very special sphere no one ever dared to collect, as it was said that it possessed terrible and uncontrolable powers. This gained Yuna´s interest, and despite the dangers that could have been waiting for them, she and Rikku quickly tried to locate the sphere. In the end, after a long journey they found the sphere in a cave somewhere near Bevelle. Though it was guarded by a behemoth, they defeated the creature and took the sphere with them. Back onboard their airship (called "Celsius"), Yuna and Rikku as well as the crew of the Celsius (including Rikku´s brother) were gathering in order to see what the sphere would show them. Well, nothing. Yuna, disappointed by the fact that sphere didn´t even show any useful images, threw it onto the ground.
"Yunie...don´t worry!" Rikku yelled.
"We´ll find a useful sphere next time! I´m sure about that!"
"Thanks, Rikku."
"Anyway, you should go to your room and rest a bit. Oh yeah, before we leave, I´ll have to go to Bevelle again. I have some business there, y´know."
"Okay, Rikku. We´ll be waiting for you."
So Rikku (as the only member of the Celsius) left the Celsius and went off to the nearby city of Bevelle. Yuna, while sitting on her bed, looked at the sphere again. Something was strange about it; the sphere had something she never felt about other spheres. So she grabbed the sphere again, and...woosh! A strange light came out of the sphere and covered the whole airship. What Yuna didn´t realize then was the fact that the airship was shrinking down to the size of a mere ant.

11522212.content:
Our story begins shortly after the SeeD attack on Dollet. Squall, Xell and Selphie all took part in the fight against Galbadia there, and they succeeded. Due to their achievements, they were all granted the rank of a SeeD. And now, their next mission was about to start. Destination: Timber, a city occupied by Galbadia. But there was rebel group formed against Galbadia: the Timber Forest Owls. And they have asked the SeeDs for help. And Squall, Xell and Selphie were the ones to be send there. They met in a small room in Balamb Garden, where they were awaiting Quistis. She wanted to give them some advice before leaving.
But during their wait, something unusual was happening. Each of them felt a sudden tiredness, and seconds later they collapsed and fell asleep (much like in the game, when they are sent to...oh, I don´t want to spoil anything in case you haven´t played part 8). After what seemed like an eternity, Squall was the first one to wake up again. He rubbed his eyes, looked around...and was shocked by what he saw. Quistis´ right foot was directly in front of him, but...it was as big as a house and he was only as big as an ant!
"Hey, everyone, where are you?" Quistis asked, surprised that there was no one here. But of course, Squall and the others were in the same room, with one small difference: they must have been shrunken to microscopic size somehow. Squall didn´t care why this happened, right now, it was more important to stay alive, as Quistis could easily crush them by accident.
"Xell, Selphie, wake up!"
"Uh...what´s the matter, pal?"
"*yawn* I had such a niiiice dream!" Selphie murmured.
"I´ve been dreaming I was ant-sized, and..."
Xell and Selphie grew silent as they saw the titanic Quistis in front of them.
"Aaaaahhh! What happened?!"
"No time to think about it! We gotta escape!"

12111.content:
Hi! May I introduce myself? My name is Marcus, and I have the unbelievable luck to live in the same country like Hitomi: in Germany. I take it you all know who I´m talking about, right? I´m speaking of Hitomi, the daughter of a beautiful Japanese woman and a German martial arts expert. And I can tell you, Hitomi is stunningly gorgeous! She´s 18 years old, thus she´s still visiting high school (of course, here in Germany, we don´t call it high school. We have something different, we call it Gymnasium, and no, it´s not the same as in America, not the building where you can do sports), and the best part is: she´s in the same class as I am, and she´s directly next to me! That´s hardly a surprise, since Hitomi and I are close friends since our early childhood, and our parents are close friends as well. I even traveled along with her in order to witness her fighting skills at the DoA tournament in Japan, and she´s a great martial arts expert, her father can be truly proud of her. Of course, one would not expect a gentle girl like Hitomi to be doing so well in the martial arts field, but believe it or not, she´s a great fighter.
So, you now might ask: "what´s the point of all this? Isn´t that a GTS-endosomatophilia story?". In that case, you´re right, my dear reader. I was just giving you some exposition before the really exciting parts starts. Because one day, I, a perfectly ordinary 18 year old guy, went on an adventure of a lifetime, an adventure that lead me to places no human has gone before, where no man ever was able to set his step personally. If I may say so, I am the first person ever who was able to shrink down to near microscopic size!
So this is where our true story begins.
12111.title: Tales from the Sith

choices: I shrunk down to a fraction of an inch tall
I shrunk down to near microscopic size
121111.content:
First of all, you must know that my father is an inventor. Yes, you heard that right, and he´s a genius. Imagine someone like...Wayne Szalinski from "Honey I shrunk the kids" (nice flick by the way, and Rick Moranis does a cool job), without the nerdy and clumsy attitude. In fact, my father really was able to develop a shrinking ray, like in some sci-fi movies. Of course I didn´t know about that before, but unfortunately, I was about to find out, and Hitomi indirectly.
Twas one day after school, and Hitomi and I went home to me. We didn´t have much time, since she had to go the dojo for her training, so we just wanted to eat something before leaving. You must know, I myself am not practicing martial arts like Hitomi, I´m just sometimes accompanying her, because I like spending time together with her. My mother prepared something sweet, a cake for both of us: Sachertorte, Hitomi´s favourite meal. I still thank my mum for that, as if she knew I really like Hitomi and thus prepared her favourite food. I finished the cake before Hitomi could dinish hers, so I decided to go upstairs into the attic, just for fun. I still don´t know why I went to the attic that day, but afterwards, I think it was the right decision. Besides, dad often worked in the attic on his devices, so I was a little curious, and since he wasn´t there and Hitomi not yet ready, I went up the stairs to the mysterious looking attic. I opened the door, and...was kinda disappointed. There wasn´t really much to see, in fact nothing, only a strange looking thing hidden under a wite blanket.
"Huh? What´s this?", I thought, so I took a closer look. I removed the blanket, and before me, there was a futuristic looking...superlaser? It really looked like some metallic laser-weapon from some sci-fi flick.
"That´s what dad was working on? Lame..."
I saw a bagpack on a table next to this strange machine, and I simply grabbed it.
"Hm...quite heavy. Hm? What´s that inscription? "All you need for the trip of your life". Now what does that mean?"
Out of fun, I put the bag on, and while doing so, I noticed a control panel attached to the machine.
"Hm...I shouldn´t do this, but...why not?"
So I pressed some buttons on the control panel, just out of fun.
"Well...nothing happened at all."
That was when the machine suddenly was activated and started making strange noises, as if it was charging. Before I knew, I was hit by a greenish ray!
121111.title: The attic...

choices: due to an open window, I´m being blown into Hitomi´s glass by the air
Hitomi´s breathing is so strong for me that she inhales me!
1211111.content:
"Damn it! What´s going on?!"
The world around me began to change...or at least I thought so, because I realized later that it was me who changed. Everything around seemed to be getting bigger and bigger, until it finally stopped after about 10 seconds. And as the change stopped, everything was different. That was no longer the boring attic...no, this was now a vast wasteland, and this device I activated was towering over me like a mountain, and I mean a really high mountain. I was trembling in fear, angry at me because I activated the machine for no apparent reason. Suddenly, I heard some bleeps coming out of the bagpack I was wearing, so I put it off and opened it. There were all kind of things, and I had no idea what their purpose was (but I gladfully found out about that later), and I realized the bleeps came from some sort of watch. So I put it around my wrist, watching on the display, but there was nothing, obviously that thing was not activated yet. I pressed a small button, on the right, and there appeared a message on the screen, accompanied by a robotic voice.
"Shrinkage successful. Current size: 1 millimeter."
Your face was turning pale. 1 millimeter? Shrinkage? So that machine...was a shrink ray? And it shrunk me down to 1 millimeter? That´s even smaller than 1/16 of an inch? With that size, I was merely a speck for an ordinary human! I had to get help, but how? How would I be able to get in contact with a normal person, bein just an insignificant speck?
As if my situation wasn´t already grim, things were getting even worse, as the ground began to shake heavily, just like during an earthquake. And I was able to see the reason for the quake: Hitomi was entering the room, and every step she took with her gigantic boots caused me to fall down on the ground, due to the powerful impact.
"Huh? Marcus, where are you?"
Surprisingly, her voice didn´t seem to be that much louder, still her soft and kind voice.
"Hitomi, I´m down here! Hitomi!"
Of course, she didn´t hear me, and she couldn´t see me as well, and I was getting sad because of this. She could have been able to help me, but that was more than unlikely at that moment. Staring at her in all her beauty, I realized that she was not just huge. No, she was monstrously huge, in any case it´s hard to put in words. I also realized that she was holding a glass filled with water in her right hand. If I had known back then that the true adventure was just about to start...
1211111.title: The endosomatophilia adventure soon begins...

choices: do I need to say more? The water and I went down her throat!
12111111.content:
I said it was an adventure of a lifetime, didn´t I? Yes, that´s right, and now you´ll see what I meant.
Unfortunately, the window in the attic was open, and a small breeze was entering the room. Hitomi probably didn´t even notice, but to me, the breeze was so strong that I was engulfed by it and whisked away. I had no idea where I was being blown, it all went on so fast. But then I suddenly fell down, and I splashed into some water. Due to the impact, I was underwater for a few seconds, but then I swam up to the surface.
"W-where am I?"
It seemed like a gigantic ocean, and I slowly realized where I was. I was inside Hitomi´s glass of water.
"Oh no! If she´s going to drink, then..."
To my dismay, Hitomi took a sip as she left the room. The glass began to shift and the masses of water began flowing into a monstrously big pink cave in the distance: Hitomi´s mouth, framed by her rows of teeth and her lips. She then closed her gaping maw again, walking into the kitchen to my mother.
"Have you seen Marcus?"
"No, isn´t he in the attic?"
"Nope."
"Hm..."
"That idiot! He promised me to go with me to the dojo!"
Ouch. These words really hurt. I absolutely didn´t want to make Hitomi angry, but I managed to...although I was so near to her. Fortunately, my mother managed to minimize Hitomi´s anger. My mother always knew that I really like Hitomi, so she wanted to help me with that out.
"Hitomi, I don´t think Marcus is doing it on purpose. He would never let you down, you know that."
"Yes...I guess you´re right."
"Maybe he didn´t feel well and went into his room. In any case you should go to your training now, Hitomi. Marcus will call you later."
"Will he?"
"Yes, I´ll make sure he will."
"Thanks, miss."
Well, in theory, that was great. Hitomi was no longer angry at my sudden disappearance, so I should have been happy. But honestly: would you have been happy if at the same time Hitomi was bringing the glass to her lips again? I guess you wouldn´t have been to keen on that situation. In any case the glass shifted again, and now the water was flowing into her mouth and down her throat with an even higher speed. There was no way I could swim against the current, it was as futile as if I was trying to swim up a waterfall. All I could see were Hitomi´s pink, glossy upper lip and her cavernous, huge mouth, and I sucked into....

The carribean. A wonderful place o relax, you might think. Not so in this classic story, where soon chaos will break out. But read for yourself.
Early in the morning, on the beach of some beautiful island in the carribean, a spaniard and a rich looking american guy were having a discussion.
"Well, professor, Gonzales, do you have the growth potion?"
"Si, si, senor Drez."
"Excellent."
"Pero hay que decir que la potion esta solamente para las cosas buenas!"
"Yes, don´t worry, I won´t use it for some evil plan. I´m just a giantess fan. Are you not?"
"Si, claro. Soy tambien!"
"He. Well, then, here´s your reward. I think 50000 bucks will do."
"Bueno, me gusta mucho!"
"I hope you´ll bring the reverse potion soon."
"Si, si. Adios!"
"Farewell."
The spaniard left, and senor Drez was pleased. A growth potion, that creates lots of interesting oppotunities. Suddenly, Hitomi, a good friend of him, showed up, wearing a cute bikini.
"Hey, Drez. I´m gonna swim a bit. You too?"
"Uhm, not yet."
"Say, did you see "him" today?"
"No, I guess "he" is still sleeping, but he´ll soon come."
"Okay. Hey, that bottle you have there, may I have a sip from it? I´m thirsty, you know."
"Sure, cutie."
Hitomi took only a sip from the mysterious bottle, visibly satisfied.
"Ah, that was good. Hic! Uh, sorry."
But then, the inevitable was about to happen as Hitomi screamed in pain and her body began to change.
Meanwhile, somewhere else on the island, a tired looking, ordinary guy was walking on the beach. He went to a cute looking, black haired girl (her name is unknown).
"Good morning, Mr. Sith."
"Good morning. And just Sith, please."
"Okay."
"Did you see Drez today?"
"I guess he already went to the beach."
"Uh-hu. And did you see Hitomi?"
Suddenly the girl began to scream, pointing with her finger at some place over the ocean behind Sith.
"Huh?"
Sith turned around, and what he saw wasn´t that scary or unusual. Just the gorgeous Hitomi, with astronomic size, walking toward the beach he was on.
"Oh...not again. Well, looks like I haven´t much of choice."
Sith put on his dark robe and hood and ran toward the giantess, with the main theme of the Batman series from the sixties.

125221.content:
Kokoro. How could you possibly forget her? At least you were having the adventure of a life-time together with her. But let us begin to tell your story from the start.
You are Marcus Brody (yes, that´s actually your name...don´t sue me if it sounds familiar...), an 18-year old student from the United States. Last summer, you decided to go on a vacation, with your destination being Japan. You were always fascinated with that country, and you wanted to see it first-hand, and what other city in Japan could one visit but Tokyo? And it was rather cool, since you were having fun in the arcades, shopping in Akihabara or other fun-stuff. But that was nothing compared to the things to come. The things that were about to unfold are simply to incredible to be described in just a few words. So they will be described as clearly as possible, my dear reader. In any case these events were unlike anything you could have expected from a vacation. Icing the cake if you want.
One day during your vacation, you decided that studying some cultural aspects of Japan would be an interesting thing, so you went to an old shrine in the "outskirts" of Tokyo. First, it was quite the thing you would expect from such an antique shrine: nice architecture, and many tourists. But then it happened. You saw HER. She was caring for some flowers outside the shrine, and the flowers matched her beauty perfectly. In fact, you spotted there the most beautiful girl you´ve ever seen, in that field flowers. She was wearing some traditional, white robes, which made her look gorgeous in a special way, since that outfit put some emphasis on her natural beauty; since you detest slutty, over-the-top clothes. She had long black hair, and a face with a look like that of an angel, perfectly smooth and natural. She had absolutely no make-up in her face, her fingernails were white and quite long - yet not too long - and she wasn´t wearing any jewelry. You knew immediately that she was the girl you always dreamed of. You had to talk to her. And you had the guts to pull that of. Indeed you talked to her, and thanks to your kind words, she immediately liked you. Her name is Kokoro, she said, daughter of the current guardian of the shrine. Kokoro and you spent the whole day together, and in the evening, you and her were sitting on a bench outside the shrine, in front of the flower field.
"Say, Kokoro, have you any plans for the near future?"
"Oh yes, I have. I´m planning to participate at the Dead or Alive tournament."
"Really? Wow...that´s...that´s just incredible, you know. You don´t look like a person who likes to fight. You look more like an...angel."
"Thanks. But I´m not participating because I like the fighting. I´m doing it for the sake of my family. Many of my ancestors were great fighters, and I want to continue this tradition. But honestly, I prefer taking care of the shrine. I don´t really like fights. By the way, are you hungry? I have some candy with me." she said as she showed you a pack of candies she was holding in her right hand. They looked like some ordinary pieces of chocolate. At least they looked like that.

It was an ordinary day in the mushroom kingdom, and it was the same old thing in Bowser's castle as well. Wendy was once again being teased by her siblings who, despite not being much taller than her themselves, insisted on calling her short. Wendy quickly got fed up with the teasing, and ran to her father's throne room in a tantrum.

"DADDY!" Wendy yelled

"What is it Wendy?" Bowser responded

"I'M SICK OF THE OTHERS CALLING ME SHORT! MAKE ME BIGGER!!!"

Bowser began to think it over. He quickly came up with a perfect evil plan: He would grow Wendy to a colossal size and have her destroy the Mario bros once and for all!

"Alright Wendy, I'll make you big. But you have to do something for me afterward."

"Really? Okay daddy, I'll do it! Just make me bigger!"

"Alright sweety. Here's the deal: I'm gonna make you grow 50 feet tall, then you go and destroy those pesky plumbers once and for all! Do that, and you can stay huge for as long as you want!"

Wendy simply nodded her head in agreement. Bowser the pulled out a magikoopa's wand and aimed it at his daughter. The wand shot a blast of green energy which struck Wendy. She immediately began to feel the effects of the magic. Her body was tingling all over, and it felt absolutely amazing. Suddenly, her body began to grow to monumental proportions. She continued to grow until she reached the amazing height of 50 feet tall. She looked down to her feet and saw her father looking up at her in awe. She simply smiled at her new power.

"Thank you daddy! The view is amazing from up here! I love being this huge!"

"Well that's good, sweety. Now remember your end of the deal! You have to eliminate the Mario bros once and for all!"

"Oh yeah, that..."


What will Wendy do next?

info.brief_description: A new, improved Interactive Story about GTS from Sith. This time, it´s personal! ;)
info.description:
Hello there! With my first GTS Interactive, I wanted to see what I´m able to write and I also wanted to learn how to create a GTS Interactive. And of course, my first one was flawed. Well, this time, I´m trying to get rid of my former mistakes. Now, the instructions:
1. Needless to say, no sexual content or adult language, okay?
2. You might have guessed: I´m into the vore thing; and you could see that in my first one. So, you can bet that I´ll create vore scenes in this one as well (I hope you´ll do that, too ;) ).
But I´m trying to use more exposition, explanations and dialogue in order to stay true to the characters. So, I won´t start directly with a vore scene, exposition comes first.
3. Another problem in my former story: too many choices. This time, I´ll reduce the number of gals. I didn´t choose the available girls yet (coming soon), but in any case there will be the ones from DoA and Final Fantasy.
4. Most importantly: the setting. That´s no problem with Final Fantasy, there are already huge worlds from the games you can use, but in some other games, it´s a more complicated thing. So I´ll allow to create your own worlds for some stories; your own setting, in case there isn´t much explained in the game.
5. Vore: yes, please! But: no chewing, no digestion!
6. Be creative! Have Fun!
Update! In case you´re going to add chapters: please, for god´s sake, try to use decent grammar and spelling or punctuation marks! My English is bad, I know, but at least I´m trying, and you´re supposed to as well. Thanks!
info.pretty_title: A New Video Game GTS Interactive
